reviews.review:
unplayable. If you are not playing on 3rd party platforms (faceit/ ESEA) the game is cancer.

 With the addition of trust factor in this game, if you are at least a half decent player, the game is impossible to play on Valve's official servers. Non stop cheaters all because your trust factor gets low because you hit shots. 

On top of all that there is no way to know how to improve your trust factor to get out of hacker central. Doesn't matter if you have prime or not, you ^!#$ed your game for the decent casual player. 

@$!@#$ you Valve.
